name: Google Drive Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Drive Tool 节点。主要用于: Access data on Google Drive

preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleDrive.displayName: Retrieve, analyze, and answer questions using your Google Drive documents with our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleDrive.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleDrive
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleDrive.natural_language_description: 参数名: Retrieve, analyze, and answer questions using your Google Drive documents with our pre-built

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Access data on Google Drive | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2
available_options: OAuth2 (recommended) (值: oAuth2)
Service Account (值: serviceAccount)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file
available_options: File (值: file)
File/Folder (值: fileFolder)
Folder (值: folder)
Shared Drive (值: drive)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a folder
Delete (值: deleteFolder) - Permanently delete a folder
Share (值: share) - Add sharing permissions to a folder
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

name.name: name
name.description: The name of the new folder. If not set, 'Untitled' will be used.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Name | 作用: The name of the new folder. If not set, 'Untitled' will be used.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: emailMessage (值: None) - A plain text custom message to include in the notification email

moveToNewOwnersRoot (值: None) - This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive and the request is attempting to transfer the ownership of the item.When set to true, the item is moved to the new owner's My Drive root folder and all prior parents removed.
sendNotificationEmail (值: None) - Whether to send a notification email when sharing to users or groups
transferOwnership (值: None) - Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer

useDomainAdminAccess (值: None) - Whether to perform the operation as domain administrator, i.e. if you are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs, you will be granted access automatically.

driveId.name: driveId
driveId.description: The drive where to create the new folder
driveId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent Drive | 作用: The drive where to create the new folder | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': 'My Drive'} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File to Update | 作用: The file to update | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

sameFolder.name: sameFolder
sameFolder.description: Whether to copy the file in the same folder as the original file
sameFolder.natural_language_description: 参数名: Copy In The Same Folder | 作用: Whether to copy the file in the same folder as the original file | 默认值: True

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.description: The parent folder where to create the new folder
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent Folder | 作用: The parent folder where to create the new folder | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': 'root', 'cachedResultName': '/ (Root folder)'} | (必填项)

content.name: content
content.description: The text to create the file with
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text to create the file with

permissionsUi.name: permissionsUi
permissionsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Permissions | 默认值: {}
available_options: permissionsValues (值: None)

changeFileContent.name: changeFileContent
changeFileContent.description: Whether to send a new binary data to update the file
changeFileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Change File Content | 作用: Whether to send a new binary data to update the file | 默认值: False

inputDataFieldName.name: inputDataFieldName
inputDataFieldName.description: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to update the file in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab
inputDataFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to update the file in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab | 提示: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to update the file | 默认值: data | (必填项)

newUpdatedFileName.name: newUpdatedFileName
newUpdatedFileName.description: If not specified, the file name will not be changed
newUpdatedFileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: New Updated File Name | 作用: If not specified, the file name will not be changed

searchMethod.name: searchMethod
searchMethod.description: Whether to search for the file/folder name or use a query string
searchMethod.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Method | 作用: Whether to search for the file/folder name or use a query string | 默认值: name
available_options: Search File/Folder Name (值: name)
Advanced Search (值: query)

queryString.name: queryString
queryString.description: Use the Google query strings syntax to search for a specific set of files or folders. Learn more.
queryString.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query String | 作用: Use the Google query strings syntax to search for a specific set of files or folders. Learn more.

filter.name: filter
filter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: {}
available_options: driveId (值: None) - The drive you want to search in. By default, the personal "My Drive" is used.
folderId (值: None) - The folder you want to search in. By default, the root folder of the drive is used. If you select a folder other than the root folder, only the direct children will be included.
whatToSearch (值: None)
fileTypes (值: None) - Return only items corresponding to the selected MIME types
fileTypes (值: None) - Return only items corresponding to the selected MIME types
includeTrashed (值: None) - Whether to return also items in the Drive's bin

folderNoRootId.name: folderNoRootId
folderNoRootId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder | 作用: The folder to share | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)
